vote.title: To authorize and direct the Administrative and Presiding Judge of the Franklin County Municipal Court to accept a grant award from the Ohio Department of Public Safety; to appropriate $425,000.00 from the unappropriated balance of the general government grant fund to the Franklin County Municipal Court to provide two pretrial service officers and Spanish interpreters for probation; and to declare an emergency. ($425,000.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
